name: root_monitor
description: This change is the root change of this process.
All changes depend on it and it monitor the whole process.
title: Root Change

name: integration
description: This change is the integration change of this process, and it depends on all changes.
A gNB package will be built under this change and follow that there will be tests.
If there are any adaptions, write down them at gerrit change comments and formatting as update_bb:COMPONENT_NAME,REPO_URL,REPO_VER
If you want to specify a base for a stream, write down them at gerrit change comments and formatting as update_base:STREAM,BASE
remark: To specify bitbake version, comment update_bb:COMPONENT_NAME,bb,REPO_VER
title: Integration Manager
